DATES October 15, 1954
President Graydon Ausmus has asked me to pass on to you his appointment
of you to the Committee to plan the NAEB Convention to be held in Chicago in
1955 * We hope you can and will be able to serve • As soon as you let me know
I'll send you all materials on hotels, etc., as received to date0
^Chairman
